text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump As they lie dying, CoronaVirus patients are fully conscious with most aware they’re DYING. In excruciating pain, they sense drowning while still alive. ALONE, their last wish is to see loved ones kept from their rooms. #CoronaVirusIsNotFLU #ReopeningUSmeansMoreDIE

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
